thought.text: Now let me test the fix:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpyjyraizy/sympy && python -c "
from sympy import MatrixSymbol

A = MatrixSymbol('A', 2, 2)
B = MatrixSymbol('B', 2, 2)
expr = A - B

print('Testing _get_positive_term function:')
for i, arg in enumerate(expr.args):
    print(f'arg[{i}]: {arg}')
    if hasattr(arg, 'args') and len(arg.args) > 0 and arg.args[0] == -1:
        from sympy.matrices.expressions.matmul import MatMul
        positive = MatMul(*arg.args[1:])
        print(f'  positive version: {positive}')
"
